content: snip the voodoo doll i set out to create a voodoo doll family snip is the child of stitch & stella each pattern is available separately snip is about 9 inches tall materials 4 5mm hook worsted weight yarn - base color contrasting stitch & hair color crochet thread or embroidery floss one button felt or random fabric for heart & patch scissors stitch marker yarn needle worked in the round - top-down - uses basic crochet stitches error round 8 should be increase single_crochet 6 around 48
